## AvroAdapterInterceptor.intercept() method

Intercepts http request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
intercept(req: HttpRequest<any> & AdditionalInfo<IgnoredInterceptorId & AvroRequestType & AvroResponseType>, next: HttpHandler): Observable<HttpEvent<any>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
